description:
She`s one of Karyuusai Brand`s greatest automatons, the Flower in their Setsugetsuka Series. Her magic circuit, Yaegasumi posses the ability to shut off the targets sight, sound, and scent. She`s Yaya`s little sister and she calls Irori Onee-sama. She`s bright, freewheeling, and very friendly.
Source: ANN
name: Komurasaki
